page.title: 05HOUSING IN THE BACK DISTRICT
page.content: {THE BLACK HOUSE This is the type of house found in the area in the past.The black house consists of two rooms, one for the crofter's family, the other for his animals.The walls were thick and made of undressed stone.The roof was thatched. {THE CROFT HOUSE This was the most common type of house until recently.It was a two-storey house made of stone and mortar with a slate roof and dormer windows. {TO-DAY'S HOUSES} The most popular type is the kit house which has an inner wall of wood and an outer wall of concrete blocks.Pebble dash is used for the exterior. {COUNCIL HOUSES} There are 2 main council schemes in the area,one built 30 yrs ago and the other built 10 yrs ago.
